Headline: Sessions: "I did not have communications with the Russians."
Text: Franken quizzes Sessions during confirmation hearings: “I’m not aware of any of those activities… I have been called a surrogate at a time or two in that campaign and I did not have communications with the Russians.”
Media Caption: Jeff Sessions: "I did not have communications with the Russians." (C-SPAN)

Headline: Leahy writes Sessions
Text:
Leahy asks Sessions: Have you been in contact with anyone connected to any part of the Russian government about the 2016 election, either before or after election day?

RESPONSE: No.
Media Caption: Nomination of Jeff Sessions to be Attorney General of the United States Questions for the Record
